tool_description: The "Image Intelligence API" is a powerful tool that uses artificial intelligence to understand and describe the content of your images. It can seamlessly identify and interpret the various elements within an image, providing detailed, context-aware descriptions, thereby transforming visual data into actionable insights.
name: Image Describing AI - Visual Decoder
title: Image Describing AI - Visual Decoder

api_list.name: Describe Image
api_list.description: Ask a question about the image.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://image-describing-ai-visual-decoder.p.rapidapi.com/describe_image"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "image-describing-ai-visual-decoder.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://image-describing-ai-visual-decoder.p.rapidapi.com/describe_image"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "image-describing-ai-visual-decoder.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
